The guidelines for the "SH Meets SH" fiction challenge have been 
modified somewhat because of changes to the list and Masayoshi's 
wonderful idea of "what if Holmes went to Japan instead?" The new 
document has been uploaded into the Challenges & Contests folder 
under Files.  Also in the "SH Meets SH" folder you'll find incredible 
notes on the Jack the Ripper murders, generously provided by 
MissBehavin'.

For those of you who come to us from lists other than miburo, check 
it out!

phil (who may be AWOL at various times the next couple weeks or so as 
I help reformat stories for an archive site (not SHQ!) that's been 
lost... so much for returning to my own writing)
